trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bellevue
There were no other sightings in Bellevue on or around July 23rd 2011
Summary: sitting on a deck,3 blocks from Lake Sammamish looking east and up at a 30' angle with a hill blocking sun setting in the west, i spoted ufo flying south over the laKE.
divs: Sighting DetailsaT A PROGRESSIVE DINNER PARTY CLOSE TO 16 NE. I SPOTTED CRAFT WITH UNUSEUAL MOTION MOVING FROM NORTH TO SOUTH AT UNDER 1000' FEET AND UNDER 150 MPH. THE DIRECTION WAE STREIGHT AND LEVEL BUT MOTION AND SHAPE OF CRAFT WERE ALL WRONG. AT THAT HIGHT IT WAS CATCHING SETTING SUNLIGHT. THE CRAFT APEARED TO BE A 15 FOOT DIA. CYLINDER AND 100 FEET LONG. ( 10 TO 1) RATIO NO MATER WHAT ACTUAL SIZE. THE CRAFT ROTATED SLOWLY ABOUT ITS LONG AXIS SHOWING DIFFERANT FEATURES OFITS SURFACE IN THE SUNLIGHT. AT THE SAMETIME THE CRAFT MORE RAPIDLY ROTATED END TO END PARALLEL TO THE EARTH. IT MADE NO AUDIBLE NOISE (OLD HEARING IS FAULTY). IWAS THE ONLY ON AT THE PARTY LOOKING ITHE EXACT DIRECTION AND BY THE TIME I REACTED AND CALLED TO THE OTHERS ONLY ONE CAUGHT A FLEETING GLANCE AND SAID SHE ONLY SAW FLASH OF REFLECTED SUNLIGHT. MY FIRST REACTION WAS THAT IT WAS UNLIKE ANYTHING I HAD EVER SEEN. I STAID QUIET AFTERWERDS BECAUSE THIS WAS SENSITIVE BUSINESS FUNCTION FOR MY WIFE.
